title: 107: Darkness in Light of the Holidays with Peter Rollins
itunes:title: 107: Darkness in Light of the Holidays with Peter Rollins
description:
Happy Holidays, Broads! During this special episode Bekah and Jess are joined by incredible author and philosopher, Peter Rollins. They chat a bit about the bachelor and relationships then dive into philosophy and the reason why the story of the nativity has remained (24:40). Later they discuss, feeling “lack” during life and the holidays and how it can bring us hope, stepping into the darkness, and much more!
PETER ROLLINS:
Find out more about Pete and his work: https://peterrollins.com (https://peterrollins.com/)
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/peter_rollins/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PeterRollins
And check out his podcast - “The Fundamentalists” 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-fundamentalists/id1346820645
